questions.name: Return to the arched corner of Kynance Place and Mews. Take cats' cries to cobble along and under another pair of complementary arches. Onwards, despite the dead end warning, to ascend at steep steps by a holy steeple. With the Light on your left, head straight up to a four-way junction. Snap R, and at  budding boutique bend round L to enter an almost cunning passage. Sail onwards to infinity rotated by 90. What petrified fliers are SEA LEG gone wild?
From monarch, continue on broad toward distant domes. On your left, watch for where Time Flies over pointed rooves. Caged nearby, what tree dwelling race is Spanish THE French END?

How will you handle my little amends, I wonder... Roll out L, towards sandy bricks. After crossing gardens where cars might sleep, northern city and reflected ROT garden, bend then branch L into striped celestial oasis. R to follow stripes down to their end and cross L to a continental reduced sauce street. Ahead a golden beast bears what burden?
